column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Amorifo ahemfo a wɔwɔ Jordan egya anee afamu nyinara
column3: nye Keenanfo ahemfo a wɔwɔ po ho no nyinara
column4: tsee mbrɛ EWURADZE sii na ɔweew Jordan no nsu wɔ Israelmba no enyim ma wotwae ana no
column6: nkyii so nna ahom bi nnyi hɔn mu bio

column2: "Aber no mu na EWURADZE see Josua dɛ
column4: na twitwa Israelmba no twatsia bio ne mprɛnu."

column3: na otwitwaa Israelmba no twatsia wɔ Gibeat Haaralot."

column2: "Na dza osian ntsi ma Josua twitwaa twatsia no nye yi: ɔman no a wofi Egypt bae no nyinara a wɔyɛ mbanyin no
column4: wuwuu kwan mu wɔ sar no do
column5: ber a wofi Egypt firii n'ekyir no."

column2: "Nna ɔman no a wofiir edzi no nyinara woetwitwa hɔn twatsia: na ɔman no a wofi Egypt firii no a wɔwoo hɔn kwan mu wɔ sar no do nyinara dze
"Na Israelmba no nantsewee wɔ sar no do mfe eduanan
column4: mekyerɛ mbarimba akofo no a wofi Egypt firii no
column6: osiandɛ woenntsie EWURADZE ne ndze: woyinom na EWURADZE kaa ntam dɛ ɔnnkɛma woehu asaase a ɔno EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɛn no
column7: asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no."

column3: hɔn a ɔmaa wɔsoɛree hyɛɛ hɔn ananmu no
column5: osiandɛ woenntwa hɔn twatsia wɔ kwan no mu na hɔn na Josua twitwaa hɔn twatsia no."

column3: aber a wowiee ɔman no nyinara twatsia twitwa no
column4: wɔtsenatsenaa hɔn ananmu wɔ nseraban no mu ma wɔtsee apɔw ana."

column3: Ndɛ da yi na meyi Egypt enyimguase no efi hom do. Dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ bea no ne dzin Gilgal dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na Israelmba no kyeer nsera wɔ Gilgal
column3: na wodzii apaho wɔ bosoom no ne da a otsia duanan no n'ewimbir wɔ Jeriko tɛtɛr mu."

column2: "Na wodzii apaho no n'adzekyee no nna wodzii asaase no do eburow dadaw
"Na da a wodzii asaase no do eburow dadaw no
column3: adzekyee no ara nna  manna   no siankae; na Israelmba no ennya  manna   bio; mbom wodzii Keenan asaase no do ndɔbaa wɔ afe no mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Josua wɔ Jeriko ho no
column3: ɔmaa n'enyiwa do na ohun banyin bi a ɔatwe n'afona kitsa ne nsamu dɛ ogyina n'enyim tsentsendo: na Josua kɔr ne nkyɛn

column5: na mbom dɛ EWURADZE no dɔm safohen panyin no
column6: na afei maba. Na Josua dze n'enyim butuuw famu
column9: Na mo wura ese n'akowaa dɛn?"

column2: "Na EWURADZE no dɔm safohen panyin no see Josua dɛ
column3: Yiyi wo mpaboa wɔ w'anan; na beebi mbrɛ igyinae no yɛ krɔnkrɔn. Na Josua yɛɛ dɛm."
